categories: Category:Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2

nodes.text: Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 2

Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 2 is the second issue of the Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 published by De Agostini. It came with components from the right leg of the build-able R2-D2 and contained the articles "Designing R2-D2, Part 2", Droid Directory: "3PO-series protocol droids, Part 1" and "ICs: Integrated Circuits".
